text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm in the mood for a good flick on<n>one of my days off. Little
do I expect<n>to see Mejiro Dober in the lobby.
choice_data_list: Hey, Dober! Quite the coincidence!
Hi, Dober! Quite the coincidence!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Eh? You've got the wrong person!
choice_data_list: Wait, Dober! It's me!
Wait, Dober! It's me!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's just you. Don't just shout<n>out from behind
someone! Of course I<n>was surprised!
choice_data_list: Did you have to run away, though?
Did you have to run away, though?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Trainer... You really surprised me,<n>calling out suddenly
from behind me<n>like that.
choice_data_list: Did you have to run away, though?
Did you have to run away, though?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Well, that's...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Well, that's...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I suppose I can tell you since you<n>went ahead and looked
that one time...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I suppose you already know after<n>seeing my
illustrations.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I was thinking of seeing this today.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I was thinking of seeing this today.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Dober reaches for her<n>smartphone and pulls up a
ticket she<n>had reserved online.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's a ticket for the film "Veggie<n>Caroline: Veggin' Out on
Summer<n>Vacation!" It's the latest entry in the<n>kids' anime
series she was drawing<n>characters of.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I was actually supposed to watch it<n>with Ryan, but
something came up<n>with her, so now I'm here alone.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
And there are a lot more children here<n>than I imagined... I'll
probably stand<n>out quite a lot.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Kawakami was telling me that the<n>new "Pretty Fighters"
movie was<n>about half adults and half kids, so I<n>thought
this might be similar...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I don't see any other academy<n>students either, so I feel like
I'll<n>definitely be standing out.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Maybe I should just wait until Ryan is<n>free again...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Hm, but the limited-edition entry<n>bonuses are sure to run out
before<n>then. I probably can't afford to wait.
choice_data_list: Wanna watch it together with me, then?
Would you like to watch it with me?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Huh? You had to have come here<n>because there's
something you<n>wanted to see. I'm positively sure<n>that it
wasn't Veggie Caroline.
choice_data_list:
I'm interested in knowing more about what you
want to see!

I'm interested in knowing more about what you
want to see!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Huh? You had to have come here<n>because there's
something you<n>wanted to see. Don't feel like you<n>need to
force yourself for my sake.
choice_data_list:
I'm interested in knowing more about what you
want to see!

I'm interested in knowing more about what you
want to see!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Really now... Well, don't blame me if<n>you're bored to death
or something.<n>Have it your way.
choice_data_list: All right!
Of course!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Is that right? Well, if you're okay with<n>it, then by all means,
I'd like to have<n>you see it with me.
choice_data_list: All right!
Of course!

text_block_list.name: Theater Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Seating has begun at screen 2 for<n>"Veggie Caroline:
Veggin' Out on<n>Summer Vacation!"

text_block_list.name: Theater Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Seating has begun at screen 2 for<n>"Veggie Caroline:
Veggin' Out on<n>Summer Vacation!"

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Well, that's us... Let's go, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Well, that's us... Let's go, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Everyone receives a special sticker<n>sheet as they enter the
theater. My<n>white sheet is lined with various<n>holographic
stickers featuring movie<n>characters.
choice_data_list: Would you like my stickers?
Would you like my stickers?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Everyone receives a special sticker<n>sheet as they enter the
theater. My<n>white sheet is lined with various<n>holographic
stickers featuring movie<n>characters.
choice_data_list: Would you like my stickers?
Would you like my stickers?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Is that okay? Th-thanks. I was<n>actually thinking that I might
have to<n>see the movie again to get another<n>sheet.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Is that okay? To be honest, I was<n>wanting to get two
sheets, and I would<n>have had to see the movie again. This<n>
really helps. Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Your stickers are white. Too bad it's<n>still not my preferred
color.
choice_data_list: Aren't the stickers the same on all the sheets?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Your stickers are white. Too bad it's<n>still not my preferred
color.
choice_data_list: Aren't the stickers the same on all the sheets?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The stickers are not arranged<n>randomly on the sheets. The
only<n>difference is the background color.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
That may be so, but it's exactly<n>because of that it would be
nice to get<n>your favorite color.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I bet that little kids can get really<n>upset about it. In fact, I
heard some<n>parents talking about it.
choice_data_list: How about when you were little?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I didn't... really do that. Ryan was<n>always there to smooth
things over or<n>get me the color I wanted.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I didn't really, no. Ryan would always<n>arrange to get us
younger kids the<n>colors we wanted.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ...Wait, this conversation is kind of<n>silly.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ...Wait, this conversation is kind of<n>silly.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Maybe I can ask the staff if I can<n>exchange them for some
green ones.

text_block_list.name: Theater Staff
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry, but we're unable to allow<n>color choice or
exchange of the<n>stickers. We ask for your<n>understanding.

text_block_list.name: Mother
text_block_list.text:
The nice lady says we can't change<n>them. Let's go with
this color, okay?<n>Look, it even has Caroline!

text_block_list.name: Little Girl
text_block_list.text: Nooo! I don't want green!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It seems like this little girl's stickers<n>are green. I can't help
but notice that<n>the red outfit she is wearing is rather<n>close
to Caroline's in the movie.
choice_data_list: What color did you get, Dober?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Huh? They're red.
choice_data_list:
Maybe you can exchange stickers with her
then?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Hm, hers are green all right. But how<n>can you be so sure
that she'd want<n>red?
choice_data_list: I have a feeling...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A skeptical Mejiro Dober and I<n>approach the parent and
child.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A skeptical Mejiro Dober and I<n>approach the parent and
child.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
That worked out well... How on earth<n>did you know that she
wanted red?
choice_data_list: She was wearing red overalls.
She was wearing red overalls.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
That worked out well... Trainer, how<n>did you know that she
wanted red<n>stickers?
choice_data_list: She was wearing red overalls.
She was wearing red overalls.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I tell her that since Caroline also<n>wears red overalls, she
may have<n>been trying to imitate her favorite<n>character.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I tell her that since Caroline also<n>wears red overalls, she
may have<n>been trying to imitate her favorite<n>character.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I see... Well I guess that should be<n>expected of a trainer. It's
kind of your<n>job to be observant.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Observation skills to be expected of a<n>pro trainer I see.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
That kid probably thinks you're a big<n>fan of Veggie Caroline
now.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
That kid probably thinks you're a big<n>fan of Veggie Caroline
now.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I think you managed to stand out<n>even more than me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I think you managed to stand out<n>even more than me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
The movie turned out to be much<n>more interesting than I
thought.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I was pretty surprised to see them<n>give so much screen
time to some of<n>the more obscure characters. The little<n>
ones at home must have been talking<n>about them.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: You know... I have a much younger<n>sister and brother.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
They both seem to really love Veggie<n>Caroline. I wanted to
know more<n>about what they were talking about,<n>so that's
why I wanted to come see it.
choice_data_list: These stickers are for them, aren't they?
These stickers are for them, aren't they?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Yes. I'm glad I was able to get their<n>favorite colors. If it
were just me,<n>there would have been no way I<n>could
approach anyone else to<n>exchange them.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: So thanks... for watching the movie<n>with me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Watching the movie with me was a<n>big help, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I was able to relax and not worry<n>about any eyes that would
be on me...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I was able to relax and not worry<n>about any eyes that would
be on me...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: It was kind of reassuring...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Having you there next to me was<n>rather reassuring.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: So that's the long and short of it!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Saying that, Mejiro Dober picks up<n>her pace and walks out
ahead of me,<n>her hair glistening and swaying in the<n>
twilight glow.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Saying that, Mejiro Dober turns her<n>eyes shyly away from
mine. Her<n>profile glows a faint crimson in the<n>twilight
gleam.
